modules.title: File compression (ZIP, TAR, GZIP) with integrity verification *(2025-09-24: Implemented ZIP, TAR, GZIP)*
File operations (copy, move, rename, delete) *(2025-09-24: Implemented core operations)*
File splitting and merging with automatic reconstruction *(2025-09-24: Fully functional)*
MIME type detection with basic support *(2025-09-24: Implemented using Go mime package)*
Metadata extraction (file properties, timestamps) *(2025-09-24: Basic metadata working)*
Checksum verification (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256) *(2025-09-24: Three algorithms implemented)*
RESTful API with comprehensive file operation endpoints *(2025-09-24: All P0 endpoints working)*
CLI interface with full feature parity *(2025-09-24: Complete CLI with all operations)*
Duplicate detection across directories with hash-based similarity *(2025-09-24: Implemented MD5 hash detection)*
Smart organization based on file type and date patterns *(2025-09-24: File type and date organization)*
Content-based search with filename matching *(2025-09-24: Filename search implemented)*
